net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks

Class JcrPropertyConstraints

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.adamcin.oakpal.core.checks.JcrPropertyConstraints

  • public final class JcrPropertyConstraints
extends Object
    Encapsulation of constraints on a JCR property for the JcrProperties check.

    config options:

    name
    The property name to apply restrictions to.
    denyIfAbsent
    Report violation if this property is absent on nodes within scope.
    denyIfPresent
    Report violation if this property is present on nodes within scope.
    denyIfMultivalued
    Report violation if this property has more than one value.
    requireType
    Require a specific property type. Must be a valid name for PropertyType.valueFromName(String), e.g. Binary, Boolean, Date, Decimal, Double, Long, Name, Path, Reference, String, WeakReference, or URI.
    valueRules
    A list of patterns to match against string values of this property. All rules are applied in sequence to each value of the property. If the type of the last rule to match any value is DENY, a violation is reported.
    severity
    (default: Severity.MAJOR) specify the severity if a violation is reported by this set of constraints.
